{"id":1046437115,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 3 days","timestamp":1694429157,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"524 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1046437115/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Triangular Sum of an Array","memory":"381.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int triangularSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        if (nums.size() == 1)\n            return nums[0];\n        vector<int> res;\n        for (auto i = 1; i < nums.size(); i++) {\n            res.push_back((nums[i - 1] + nums[i]) % 10);\n        }\n        return triangularSum(res);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-triangular-sum-of-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
